sys_ui_page.html:
_CUT_HERE_ $[ var docapi = new x_snc_devtools.DocumentationAPI('x_snc_run_book'); docapi.RenderHeader(); ]

Welcome to Runbook - created and maintained by Sascha Wildgrube.

Table of Contents

$[x_snc_devtools.HtmlRenderTableOfContents()]

Features

Renders an operations runbook for an instance.

Disclaimer

$[docapi.RenderDisclaimer()]

System Requirements

    $[ docapi.RenderSystemRequirements( 'Yokohama,Zurich', true, AppGetDependencies()); ]

Installation

    $[ docapi.RenderInstallationInstructionsImportFromSourceControl( 'DevTools', 'https://github.com/saschawildgrube/servicenow-devtools', true, 'https://www.wildgrube.com/servicenow-devtools/'); ] $[ docapi.RenderInstallationInstructionsImportFromSourceControl( 'Runbook', 'https://github.com/saschawildgrube/servicenow-runbook'); ] $[ docapi.RenderInstallationInstructionsAppInstall(); ]
  1. Assign the x_snc_run_book.viewer role to users that should have access to the runbook.

Reference

The Runbook UI Page is the main entry point. The html in the UI Page is generated by the HtmlRenderRunbook() function.

Configuration Options

$[docapi.RenderProperties()]

Roles

$[docapi.RenderRoles()]

Script Includes

$[docapi.RenderScriptIncludes()]

Dependencies

$[docapi.RenderDependencies()]

Technical Debt

$[docapi.RenderTechnicalDebt()]

License

$[docapi.RenderCopyright(2022,'Sascha Wildgrube')] $[docapi.RenderLicense()]

Release Notes

1.3.0 - TODO

  1. DevTools 1.132.0 is now required.
  2. Xanadu is no longer actively supported.
  3. Runbook is full ytested with Zurich.
  4. Added TOC to runbook.
  5. Added TOC to manual.
  6. Added ACLs to UI pages.

1.2.0 - 2025-06-19

  1. DevTools 1.124.0 is now required.
  2. Tokyo and Utah are no longer actively supported.
  3. Runbook has been fully tested with Xanadu and Yokohama.
  4. The instance name and instance pipeline name are now also shown in the RunBook header.

1.1.0 - 2023-08-07

  1. San Diego is no longer actively supported.
  2. Runbook as been fully tested in Utah.
  3. DevTools 1.65.0 is now required.
  4. Added chapter "Connections" to the runbook.
  5. Added test for function HtmlRenderRunbook().
  6. Removed not required template code.
  7. Changed AppInstall() to not execute other AppInstall() functions.

1.0.0 - 2022-11-14

First baselined version

_CUT_HERE_
sys_ui_page.name: manual
